definition: Good has its reward and evil has its recompense. The payback is just a matter of time
pinyin: shan4 you3 shan4 bao4 , e4 you3 e4 bao4 , ruo4 ran2 bu4 bao4 shi2 chen2 wei4 dao4
containing_words.word: 善有善报，恶有恶报，若然不报时晨未到

sentences.english: Lives, is extraordinary small just like ants.
If Beijing opts for an interpretation, it would be the third interpretation of the Basic Law since the handover.
sentences.chinese: 若然北京选择释法，就会是回归以来的第三度释法。

sentences.english: If so, what server and group name is it?
sentences.chinese: 若然，服务器和组织的名称是什么？

sentences.english: These young men have a promising future ahead of them if they will be loyal to the king of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 其实这些年青人若然效忠巴比伦王，必定前程似锦。

sentences.english: There are some people, who are born with loneliness. Spending all their lives, looking for warmth.
sentences.chinese: 若然两个人相守一生，彼此心里住着的都是另一个人。

sentences.english: I prefer to believe that if so.
If Beijing opts for an interpretation， it would be the third interpretation of the Basic Law since the handover.
sentences.chinese: 若然北京选择释法，就会是回归以来的第三度释法。

sentences.english: If he were alive, he would be thirty five.
sentences.chinese: 若然他现在还在世的话，也已经三十五岁了。

sentences.english: It was all because of insincerity if Lakita gave up.
sentences.chinese: 若然我唾弃了什么，必然是因为此人此物的不真诚。

sentences.english: If so, who, by clouds, riding sun and the moon, but travel outside the peaceful seas.
sentences.chinese: 若然者，乘云气，骑日月，而游乎四海之外。

definition: were it not for/if not for
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
Amun, deity in Egyptian mythology, also spelled Amon, Amoun, Amen, and rarely Imen
to laugh involuntarily/Taiwan pr. [e4 ran2 shi1 xiao4]
Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
